caption.p: (A) Survey scans and (B) high resolution C 1s spectra of anC, anC:Np5, anC:Np10, and anC:Np20 electrodes; (C) shows details of the C 1s decomposition for anC:Np5 into four main contributions. High resolution N 1 s spectra of (D) anC:Np5, (E) anC:Np10, and (F) anC:Np20 together with their best-fit decompositions into N Py (398.9 eV), N Pr (400 eV), N Gc (401 eV), N Gv (402.5 eV), and N Ox and satellites (>403 eV). Individual peak contributions are offset from the spectral envelope for the sake of clarity.
